metadata.description: Comprehensive rules from Brihat Parashara Hora Shastra - All major yogas, house placements, and planetary combinations

rules.condition: IF Mars in own sign (Aries or Scorpio) OR exalted (Capricorn) in angle (1st, 4th, 7th, or 10th house)
rules.effect: THEN Ruchaka Yoga (Pancha Mahapurusha) is formed. Native becomes commander-like, courageous, wealthy, and famous. Success through valor and action. Strong physique and leadership in military or technical fields.
rules.translation: Mars in angle in own or exaltation sign creates Ruchaka Yoga
rules.commentary: One of the five great yogas. Native has reddish complexion, strong build, and conquers enemies. Excel in engineering, military, surgery, or sports.

rules.condition: IF Mercury in own sign (Gemini or Virgo) OR exalted (Virgo) in angle (1st, 4th, 7th, or 10th house)
rules.effect: THEN Bhadra Yoga (Pancha Mahapurusha) is formed. Native possesses exceptional intelligence, eloquence, and business acumen. Success in education, writing, commerce, and communication. Respected for wisdom.
rules.translation: Mercury in angle in own or exaltation sign creates Bhadra Yoga
rules.commentary: Native has attractive personality, sharp intellect, and excellent communication skills. Success in academics, business, media, or technology.

rules.condition: IF Jupiter in own sign (Sagittarius or Pisces) OR exalted (Cancer) in angle (1st, 4th, 7th, or 10th house)
rules.effect: THEN Hamsa Yoga (Pancha Mahapurusha) is formed. Native becomes highly spiritual, wealthy, charitable, and wise. Respected teacher or advisor. Good fortune and moral excellence.
rules.translation: Jupiter in angle in own or exaltation sign creates Hamsa Yoga
rules.commentary: Most auspicious of Pancha Mahapurusha yogas. Native has swan-like grace, pure heart, and righteous conduct. Wealth and wisdom combined.

rules.condition: IF Venus in own sign (Taurus or Libra) OR exalted (Pisces) in angle (1st, 4th, 7th, or 10th house)
rules.effect: THEN Malavya Yoga (Pancha Mahapurusha) is formed. Native enjoys luxury, beauty, artistic talents, and happy marriage. Success in arts, fashion, entertainment. Material comforts and refined tastes.
rules.translation: Venus in angle in own or exaltation sign creates Malavya Yoga
rules.commentary: Native has attractive appearance, artistic talents, and enjoys pleasures. Success in creative fields, luxury goods, or entertainment industry.

rules.condition: IF Saturn in own sign (Capricorn or Aquarius) OR exalted (Libra) in angle (1st, 4th, 7th, or 10th house)
rules.effect: THEN Sasa Yoga (Pancha Mahapurusha) is formed. Native achieves authority through discipline, hard work, and patience. Success in administration, law, labor management. Longevity and steady rise to power.
rules.translation: Saturn in angle in own or exaltation sign creates Sasa Yoga
rules.commentary: Native has commanding presence, strong organizational skills, and rises through persistence. Excel in administration, real estate, mining, or labor-intensive industries.

rules.condition: IF 9th lord conjunct 10th lord
rules.effect: THEN powerful Raja Yoga is formed. Native achieves high status through fortune and professional excellence. Success through dharmic means. Rise to leadership positions.
rules.translation: Conjunction of lords of dharma and karma creates royal combination
rules.commentary: This yoga links fortune (9th) with career (10th), bringing success through righteous action. Native gains respect and authority.

rules.condition: IF 5th lord conjunct or aspect 9th lord
rules.effect: THEN Raja Yoga is formed. Native gains through education, creativity, and fortune. Intelligence combined with luck brings success.
rules.translation: Association between lords of intellect and fortune creates prosperity
rules.commentary: This yoga blends intelligence (5th) with fortune (9th). Native succeeds through education, speculation, or creative pursuits.

rules.condition: IF 2nd lord conjunct 11th lord
rules.effect: THEN strong Dhana Yoga is formed. Native accumulates substantial wealth through multiple income sources. Excellent financial management and prosperity.
rules.translation: Conjunction of wealth and gains lords multiplies prosperity
rules.commentary: This powerful combination links accumulated wealth (2nd) with gains (11th), creating financial abundance.

rules.condition: IF 5th lord in 11th house OR 11th lord in 5th house
rules.effect: THEN Dhana Yoga is formed. Native gains wealth through speculation, investments, creativity, or children. Financial gains through intelligent decisions.
rules.translation: Exchange between lords of intellect and gains brings speculative success
rules.commentary: This yoga links intelligence/speculation (5th) with gains (11th), favorable for stock market, gambling, or creative enterprises.

rules.condition: IF 1st lord conjunct 2nd lord
rules.effect: THEN Dhana Yoga is formed. Native has natural ability to earn and accumulate wealth. Self-efforts lead to financial success.
rules.translation: Association of self and wealth lords brings prosperity through own efforts
rules.commentary: This combination links personality (1st) with wealth (2nd), indicating native's personal magnetism attracts financial opportunities.

rules.condition: IF 1st lord in 11th house OR 11th lord in 1st house
rules.effect: THEN Dhana Yoga is formed. Native gains wealth through personal efforts and networking. Success in business and entrepreneurship.
rules.translation: Exchange between self and gains creates wealth through personal enterprise
rules.commentary: Native's personality directly contributes to financial gains. Strong entrepreneurial abilities.

rules.condition: IF Venus conjunct Jupiter in 2nd or 11th house
rules.effect: THEN powerful Dhana Yoga is formed. Exceptional wealth through wisdom and luxury goods. Success in finance, jewelry, or advisory roles.
rules.translation: Great benefics in wealth houses create abundance
rules.commentary: Jupiter (wisdom, expansion) and Venus (luxury, beauty) together in wealth houses bring exceptional prosperity.

rules.condition: IF multiple benefics in 2nd house
rules.effect: THEN strong wealth accumulation. Native enjoys material abundance and financial security. Good family wealth.
rules.translation: Benefic planets in 2nd house multiply wealth
rules.commentary: Jupiter, Venus, Mercury, or waxing Moon in 2nd house enhance wealth prospects significantly.

rules.condition: IF 11th house has multiple benefics
rules.effect: THEN native receives gains from multiple sources. Large network of friends and supporters. Wishes fulfilled easily.
rules.translation: Benefics in 11th house bring fulfillment and prosperity
rules.commentary: 11th house represents gains, income, and fulfillment of desires. Benefics here ensure continuous inflow of resources.

rules.condition: IF 10th lord in 2nd house OR 2nd lord in 10th house
rules.effect: THEN Dhana Yoga formed. Native earns substantial wealth through profession. Career directly contributes to wealth accumulation.
rules.translation: Exchange between career and wealth brings professional prosperity
rules.commentary: This yoga links profession (10th) with wealth (2nd), indicating high earnings from career.

rules.condition: IF all planets occupy 7 consecutive houses (no gaps)
rules.effect: THEN Gola Nabhasa Yoga is formed. Native has well-rounded personality, balanced life, and success in various fields. Good fortune and stability.
rules.translation: Planets in 7 consecutive signs create round formation yoga
rules.commentary: This rare yoga indicates concentrated planetary energy. Native has focused approach and achieves success through concentrated efforts.

rules.condition: IF all planets in angles (1st, 4th, 7th, 10th houses)
rules.effect: THEN Rajju Nabhasa Yoga is formed. Native constantly travels, gains through movement, and achieves success abroad. Dynamic career involving mobility.
rules.translation: All planets in angles create rope-like formation
rules.commentary: This yoga brings restlessness and desire for movement. Success through travel, import-export, or international business.

rules.condition: IF all planets in trines (1st, 5th, 9th houses)
rules.effect: THEN powerful Nabhasa Yoga is formed. Native highly fortunate, spiritual, and wise. Success through dharmic actions and good karma.
rules.translation: All planets in trine houses create auspicious formation
rules.commentary: This rare and highly beneficial yoga brings fortune, wisdom, and spiritual elevation. Native blessed with good karma.

rules.condition: IF 1st lord in 1st house
rules.effect: THEN native has strong personality, good health, and self-confidence. Independence and self-reliance. Success through own efforts.
rules.translation: Lord of ascendant in ascendant strengthens native's character
rules.commentary: This placement gives strong sense of self, good vitality, and ability to overcome obstacles through personal strength.

rules.condition: IF 1st lord in 2nd house
rules.effect: THEN native earns wealth through personal efforts. Focus on family and finances. Good speech and education. Material comforts.
rules.translation: Lord of self in house of wealth brings financial focus
rules.commentary: Native's personality is oriented toward wealth accumulation. Success through business, banking, or family enterprises.

rules.condition: IF 1st lord in 5th house
rules.effect: THEN native is intelligent, creative, and educated. Success through intellect and children. Good speculation abilities. Spiritual inclinations.
rules.translation: Lord of self in house of intellect enhances wisdom
rules.commentary: This placement favors education, creativity, and speculative gains. Native may be successful teacher, advisor, or creative professional.

rules.condition: IF 1st lord in 10th house
rules.effect: THEN native achieves high status through profession. Strong career focus and success. Recognition and authority in chosen field.
rules.translation: Lord of self in career house brings professional excellence
rules.commentary: One of the best placements for career. Native's entire focus is on professional success, leading to high achievements.

rules.condition: IF 1st lord in 11th house
rules.effect: THEN native gains wealth easily. Large network of friends. Wishes fulfilled. Success in business and entrepreneurship.
rules.translation: Lord of self in gains house brings fulfillment
rules.commentary: This excellent placement ensures continuous gains, supportive friends, and achievement of goals. Native is socially successful.

rules.condition: IF 2nd lord in 1st house
rules.effect: THEN native earns through personal charm and efforts. Good speech and education. Wealth comes naturally. Self-made prosperity.
rules.translation: Lord of wealth in ascendant brings self-made prosperity
rules.commentary: Native's personality attracts wealth. Success through personal magnetism, public speaking, or consulting.

rules.condition: IF 2nd lord in 2nd house
rules.effect: THEN strong wealth accumulation. Excellent financial management. Good family wealth and values. Prosperity through traditional means.
rules.translation: Lord of wealth in own house multiplies prosperity
rules.commentary: This powerful placement ensures strong financial foundation. Native builds substantial wealth through conservative, traditional approaches.

rules.condition: IF 2nd lord in 4th house
rules.effect: THEN wealth through property, real estate, and mother. Gains from land, vehicles, and domestic affairs. Material comforts.
rules.translation: Lord of wealth in 4th brings gains through property
rules.commentary: This placement links wealth with property and domestic happiness. Success in real estate, agriculture, or vehicle trading.

rules.condition: IF 2nd lord in 9th house
rules.effect: THEN wealth through fortune, father, and dharmic means. Gains from teaching, publishing, or spiritual pursuits. Lucky in finances.
rules.translation: Lord of wealth in fortune house brings blessed prosperity
rules.commentary: This excellent placement combines wealth with fortune. Native earns through ethical means and receives ancestral blessings.

rules.condition: IF 2nd lord in 10th house
rules.effect: THEN wealth through profession and career. High earnings from work. Professional reputation tied to financial success.
rules.translation: Lord of wealth in career house brings professional prosperity
rules.commentary: Career becomes primary source of wealth. Native achieves financial success through professional excellence.

rules.condition: IF 7th lord in 4th house
rules.effect: THEN spouse brings domestic harmony. Marriage partner may be from mother's side. Conjugal bliss and emotional satisfaction through partnership.
rules.translation: Lord of partnership in 4th brings domestic happiness
rules.commentary: This placement creates harmony between partnership and domestic life. However, afflictions can cause conflicts with in-laws.

rules.condition: IF 7th lord in 7th house
rules.effect: THEN excellent for marriage and partnerships. Devoted spouse, happy married life. Success in business partnerships. Good for contracts.
rules.translation: Lord of partnership in own house brings marital bliss
rules.commentary: One of the best placements for marriage. Native enjoys harmonious relationships and success in partnerships.

rules.condition: IF 7th lord in 10th house
rules.effect: THEN spouse may be career-oriented. Marriage supports professional success. Business partnerships favorable. Spouse may be famous or successful.
rules.translation: Lord of partnership in career house links marriage with profession
rules.commentary: This placement can bring spouse through career connections. Marriage may enhance professional standing.

rules.condition: IF 9th lord in 1st house
rules.effect: THEN native is fortunate, dharmic, and blessed. Strong connection with father. Success through righteous actions. Spiritual inclinations.
rules.translation: Lord of fortune in ascendant brings blessed life
rules.commentary: This excellent placement makes native naturally lucky, ethical, and spiritually inclined. Success comes through dharmic actions.

rules.condition: IF 9th lord in 5th house
rules.effect: THEN powerful dharmic combination. Spiritual wisdom, good children, and creative intelligence. Success through education and righteousness.
rules.translation: Lord of fortune in house of intelligence brings wisdom
rules.commentary: This creates powerful trine connection (5-9). Native is blessed with wisdom, good progeny, and spiritual knowledge.

rules.condition: IF 9th lord in 10th house
rules.effect: THEN career through dharmic means. Professional success linked with fortune. Good reputation and ethical success. Father's blessings support career.
rules.translation: Lord of fortune in career house brings dharmic success
rules.commentary: This excellent placement ensures career success through ethical means. Native gains respect for righteous conduct.

rules.condition: IF 10th lord in 1st house
rules.effect: THEN native is highly career-focused. Success through personal efforts and charisma. Self-made professional achievements. Strong work ethic.
rules.translation: Lord of career in ascendant brings self-made success
rules.commentary: Native's entire identity revolves around career. Success comes through personal initiative and hard work.

rules.condition: IF 10th lord in 2nd house
rules.effect: THEN career brings substantial wealth. Earnings through profession. Success in banking, finance, or family business.
rules.translation: Lord of career in wealth house ensures professional prosperity
rules.commentary: This placement directly links career with wealth accumulation. High earning potential through profession.

rules.condition: IF 10th lord in 5th house
rules.effect: THEN career through creativity, education, or speculation. Success in teaching, advisory, or entertainment. Intelligent professional choices.
rules.translation: Lord of career in intelligence house brings creative success
rules.commentary: This placement favors careers in education, entertainment, consulting, or stock market. Success through intellect.

rules.condition: IF 11th lord in 1st house
rules.effect: THEN gains come naturally. Large friend circle. Wishes fulfilled easily. Success through personal magnetism and networking.
rules.translation: Lord of gains in ascendant brings easy prosperity
rules.commentary: Native attracts gains and opportunities. Success through social connections and personal charm.

rules.condition: IF 11th lord in 2nd house
rules.effect: THEN excellent for wealth accumulation. Gains add to family wealth. Multiple income sources. Financial security.
rules.translation: Lord of gains in wealth house multiplies prosperity
rules.commentary: This powerful combination ensures continuous inflow of wealth. Native builds substantial financial reserves.

rules.condition: IF 11th lord in 5th house
rules.effect: THEN gains through speculation, creativity, and children. Success in investments. Intelligent financial decisions bring profits.
rules.translation: Lord of gains in intelligence house brings speculative success
rules.commentary: This placement favors stock market, entertainment, or creative businesses. Gains through intellectual pursuits.

rules.condition: IF 11th lord in 11th house
rules.effect: THEN maximum gains and fulfillment. Large income, supportive friends, and achievement of all desires. Excellent for business.
rules.translation: Lord of gains in own house brings maximum prosperity
rules.commentary: One of the best placements for wealth. Native enjoys continuous gains, supportive network, and fulfillment of aspirations.

rules.condition: IF Sun in 1st house
rules.effect: THEN native has strong ego, leadership abilities, and authority. Good health and vitality. May have issues with humility. Success through self-effort.
rules.translation: Sun in ascendant bestows leadership and vitality
rules.commentary: Sun in 1st makes native self-centered but powerful. Natural leaders with strong presence. Should work on humility.

rules.condition: IF Moon in 4th house
rules.effect: THEN native enjoys domestic happiness, property, vehicles, and good relationship with mother. Emotional stability and material comforts.
rules.translation: Moon in 4th house brings domestic bliss
rules.commentary: Excellent placement for Moon. Native has comfortable home life, vehicles, and happy relationship with mother.

rules.condition: IF Mars in 3rd house
rules.effect: THEN native is courageous, athletic, and successful through self-efforts. Good for siblings initially but may have conflicts later. Strong willpower.
rules.translation: Mars in 3rd house bestows courage and initiative
rules.commentary: Excellent placement for Mars. Native has strong courage, competitive spirit, and achieves success through bold actions.

rules.condition: IF Mercury in 6th house
rules.effect: THEN native defeats enemies through intelligence. Success in competitions, debates, and legal matters. May face health issues related to nerves.
rules.translation: Mercury in 6th conquers obstacles through intellect
rules.commentary: This placement gives ability to outsmart opponents. Success in law, medicine, or service sector. Should manage stress.

rules.condition: IF Jupiter in 5th house
rules.effect: THEN native is highly intelligent, creative, and spiritual. Excellent for children and education. Success in teaching, advisory, or speculation.
rules.translation: Jupiter in 5th house brings wisdom and good progeny
rules.commentary: One of the best placements for Jupiter. Native is blessed with intelligence, good children, and spiritual knowledge.

rules.condition: IF Venus in 7th house
rules.effect: THEN native enjoys excellent married life. Beautiful and devoted spouse. Success in partnerships and luxury businesses. Good for art and diplomacy.
rules.translation: Venus in 7th house brings marital happiness
rules.commentary: Excellent placement for Venus. Native has harmonious marriage, successful partnerships, and refined social skills.

rules.condition: IF Saturn in 11th house
rules.effect: THEN native gains wealth through hard work and patience. Large network of older or serious friends. Slow but steady increase in income. Long-term success.
rules.translation: Saturn in 11th house brings delayed but substantial gains
rules.commentary: Excellent placement for Saturn. Native builds wealth slowly but surely. Success through persistence and discipline.

rules.condition: IF Mars is exalted in Capricorn
rules.effect: THEN native has exceptional courage, discipline, and organizational skills. Success in military, engineering, or management. Strong determination and practical action.
rules.translation: Mars is exalted in Capricorn
rules.commentary: Exalted Mars combines courage with discipline. Native achieves success through organized, strategic action.

rules.condition: IF Mercury is exalted in Virgo
rules.effect: THEN native possesses exceptional analytical skills, attention to detail, and practical intelligence. Success in research, analysis, or technical writing.
rules.translation: Mercury is exalted in Virgo
rules.commentary: Exalted Mercury at its highest expression. Native has perfect combination of intelligence, analysis, and practical application.

rules.condition: IF Jupiter is exalted in Cancer
rules.effect: THEN native has exceptional wisdom, compassion, and spiritual knowledge. Success in teaching, counseling, or spiritual leadership. Benevolent and generous nature.
rules.translation: Jupiter is exalted in Cancer
rules.commentary: Highest expression of Jupiter's wisdom and benevolence. Native becomes teacher, guide, or spiritual leader.

rules.condition: IF Venus is exalted in Pisces
rules.effect: THEN native has exceptional artistic talents, refined tastes, and spiritual love. Success in arts, music, or luxury industries. Compassionate and romantic.
rules.translation: Venus is exalted in Pisces
rules.commentary: Exalted Venus combines beauty with spirituality. Native has refined artistic sense and unconditional love.

rules.condition: IF Saturn is exalted in Libra
rules.effect: THEN native has exceptional discipline, justice, and organizational abilities. Success in law, administration, or large organizations. Fair and balanced approach.
rules.translation: Saturn is exalted in Libra
rules.commentary: Exalted Saturn brings perfect balance of discipline and fairness. Native excels in judicial or administrative roles.

rules.condition: IF Mars is debilitated in Cancer
rules.effect: THEN native may lack courage, have passive-aggressive tendencies, or face conflicts at home. Energy scattered or misdirected. Neechabhanga can significantly improve results.
rules.translation: Mars weakened in Cancer
rules.commentary: Debilitated Mars struggles with assertion. Native should work on developing healthy aggression and direct communication.

rules.condition: IF Mercury is debilitated in Pisces
rules.effect: THEN native may have scattered thinking, difficulty with details, or overly intuitive approach. Challenges in logical analysis. Cancellation improves analytical abilities.
rules.translation: Mercury weakened in Pisces
rules.commentary: Debilitated Mercury becomes too intuitive, lacking analytical rigor. Native should develop structured thinking.

rules.condition: IF Jupiter is debilitated in Capricorn
rules.effect: THEN native may face challenges with optimism, faith, or higher learning. Materialistic tendencies. Difficulty finding good mentors. Cancellation brings wisdom through experience.
rules.translation: Jupiter weakened in Capricorn
rules.commentary: Debilitated Jupiter becomes too practical, losing faith and optimism. Native learns wisdom through hardships.

rules.condition: IF Venus is debilitated in Virgo
rules.effect: THEN native may be overly critical in relationships, have difficulty expressing affection, or face challenges in love. Perfectionism affects partnerships. Cancellation brings refined artistic sense.
rules.translation: Venus weakened in Virgo
rules.commentary: Debilitated Venus becomes overly analytical in love. Native should learn to appreciate imperfections in relationships.

rules.condition: IF Saturn is debilitated in Aries
rules.effect: THEN native may face issues with discipline, patience, or long-term planning. Impulsive actions lead to setbacks. Difficulty with authority. Cancellation brings disciplined action.
rules.translation: Saturn weakened in Aries
rules.commentary: Debilitated Saturn lacks patience. Native must learn to balance action with planning and develop long-term thinking.

rules.condition: IF Sun Mahadasha AND Sun well-placed
rules.effect: THEN native gains authority, government recognition, and leadership positions. Success through father or authority figures. Health improves. 6-year period of growth.
rules.translation: Sun's period brings authority and recognition
rules.commentary: Sun Mahadasha activates leadership potential. Native gains confidence, status, and support from authority figures.

rules.condition: IF Moon Mahadasha AND Moon well-placed
rules.effect: THEN native experiences emotional fulfillment, maternal blessings, and domestic happiness. Gains through liquids, public relations, or care industries. 10-year period of comfort.
rules.translation: Moon's period brings emotional satisfaction
rules.commentary: Moon Mahadasha brings focus on family, emotions, and domestic matters. Success through nurturing professions.

rules.condition: IF Mars Mahadasha AND Mars well-placed
rules.effect: THEN native gains through courage, technical skills, or property. Success in competitive fields. Energy and drive increase. 7-year period of action and achievement.
rules.translation: Mars period brings energy and competitive success
rules.commentary: Mars Mahadasha activates courage and initiative. Native achieves goals through bold action and determination.

rules.condition: IF Mercury Mahadasha AND Mercury well-placed
rules.effect: THEN native succeeds through intellect, communication, or business. Excellent for education and skill development. 17-year period of intellectual growth and commercial success.
rules.translation: Mercury's period brings intellectual and business success
rules.commentary: Mercury Mahadasha is excellent for education, business ventures, and skill development. Native's intelligence shines.

rules.condition: IF Jupiter Mahadasha AND Jupiter well-placed
rules.effect: THEN native experiences spiritual growth, wealth, and wisdom. Marriage, children, and education flourish. 16-year period of expansion and good fortune.
rules.translation: Jupiter's period brings wisdom and prosperity
rules.commentary: Jupiter Mahadasha is highly auspicious. Native gains spiritually and materially. One of the best dasha periods.

rules.condition: IF Venus Mahadasha AND Venus well-placed
rules.effect: THEN native enjoys luxury, romance, artistic success, and material comforts. Marriage and creative pursuits flourish. 20-year period of pleasure and prosperity.
rules.translation: Venus period brings pleasure and artistic success
rules.commentary: Venus Mahadasha brings focus on relationships, arts, and luxury. Native enjoys refined pleasures and creative success.

rules.condition: IF Saturn Mahadasha AND Saturn well-placed
rules.effect: THEN native achieves lasting success through hard work and patience. Responsibilities increase but so do rewards. 19-year period of disciplined growth and maturity.
rules.translation: Saturn's period brings disciplined success
rules.commentary: Saturn Mahadasha requires patience and hard work. Success comes slowly but is lasting. Native matures significantly.

rules.condition: IF debilitated planet is aspected by its exaltation lord
rules.effect: THEN Neechabhanga Raja Yoga is formed. Debilitation cancelled. Native achieves extraordinary success after initial struggles. Rise from humble beginnings to greatness.
rules.translation: Cancellation of debilitation creates royal yoga
rules.commentary: This powerful yoga transforms weakness into strength. Native overcomes obstacles and achieves exceptional success.

rules.condition: IF debilitated planet is conjunct its exaltation lord
rules.effect: THEN Neechabhanga Raja Yoga is formed. Powerful cancellation of debilitation. Success through partnerships or combined efforts.
rules.translation: Conjunction with exaltation lord cancels debilitation
rules.commentary: This is a strong form of cancellation. Native achieves success through collaboration and receives help from mentors.

rules.condition: IF all benefics in angles (1st, 4th, 7th, 10th)
rules.effect: THEN Chamara Yoga is formed. Native gains royal comforts, excellent education, and respected position. Lives like royalty with dignity and grace.
rules.translation: Benefics in angles create royal comfort yoga
rules.commentary: This yoga brings luxurious lifestyle and high social standing. Native is well-educated and cultured.

rules.condition: IF 10th lord in exaltation aspected by Jupiter
rules.effect: THEN powerful career yoga. Native achieves exceptional professional success with blessings and wisdom. Leadership in chosen field.
rules.translation: Exalted 10th lord with Jupiter's aspect brings blessed success
rules.commentary: This combination ensures both career excellence and ethical conduct. Native becomes respected leader.

rules.condition: IF Venus in 7th house aspected by Jupiter
rules.effect: THEN excellent marriage yoga. Devoted, beautiful, and virtuous spouse. Long-lasting happy marriage with spiritual connection.
rules.translation: Venus in 7th with Jupiter's aspect creates ideal marriage
rules.commentary: This is one of the best combinations for marriage. Spouse is not only beautiful but also spiritual and devoted.

rules.condition: IF Jupiter in 5th house aspected by Mercury
rules.effect: THEN excellent yoga for children and education. Intelligent and talented children. Native is successful teacher or advisor. Creative intelligence.
rules.translation: Jupiter in 5th with Mercury's aspect brings intelligent progeny
rules.commentary: This combination ensures both wise and intelligent children. Native excels in education and creative pursuits.

rules.condition: IF exchange between 6th lord and 10th lord
rules.effect: THEN Vipreet Raja Yoga is formed. Native succeeds through service, problem-solving, or adversity. Career benefits from helping others or managing difficulties.
rules.translation: Exchange involving 6th house creates success through service
rules.commentary: This unusual yoga brings success through managing problems. Native excels in healthcare, law, or crisis management.

rules.condition: IF benefics in 6th, 7th, and 8th from Moon
rules.effect: THEN Adhi Yoga is formed. Native achieves wealth, authority, and longevity. Comfort throughout life. Success through own efforts and good health.
rules.translation: Benefics around Moon create prosperity yoga
rules.commentary: This yoga ensures comfortable life with adequate resources. Native has good health and long life.

rules.condition: IF 9th lord in angle, strong lagna lord, and Venus in own/exaltation sign
rules.effect: THEN Lakshmi Yoga is formed. Exceptional wealth, beauty, and prosperity. Blessed by Goddess Lakshmi. Material and spiritual abundance.
rules.translation: Multiple prosperity indicators create Lakshmi's blessing
rules.commentary: This rare yoga brings goddess Lakshmi's blessings. Native enjoys both material prosperity and spiritual grace.

rules.condition: IF Jupiter in angle, strong lagna lord, and Mercury in own/exaltation sign
rules.effect: THEN Saraswati Yoga is formed. Exceptional learning, eloquence, and artistic talents. Blessed by Goddess Saraswati. Mastery in arts and sciences.
rules.translation: Multiple learning indicators create Saraswati's blessing
rules.commentary: This yoga bestows goddess Saraswati's grace. Native becomes renowned scholar, artist, or teacher.
